nodes.text: The Kwilaan spaceport was a spaceport in the city of Keren on the Mid Rim planet of Naboo. It was the largest facility of its kind in the Mid Rim and was used by many travelers. The port was larger than the Theed Spaceport, which had been built in Naboo's capital city of Theed between 32 BBY and 22 BBY. The spaceport shared its name with Kwilaan, a human who discovered Naboo.

The Kwilaan spaceport was mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in "Naboo," an issue of Altaya's Star Wars Encyclopedia published on December 16, 2020. The Kwilaan Starport originated in the Star Wars Legends continuity, where it was first mentioned in Secrets of Naboo, a 2001 Wizards of the Coast sourcebook published for use with the Star Wars Roleplaying Game. It then made its first appearance in the 2003 massively multiplayer online role-playing video game Star Wars Galaxies.
